description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b8chi","text":"Protocol (wash buffer plus modified extraction) unsuccessful at detecting fish sedDNA from lakes in Maine, USA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87mfb","text":"Protocol successful at detecting fish sedDNA collected from streams during an anadromous fish sea-run migration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"cfe2i","text":"Wash Buffer from Poulain et al., 2015; modified from Zhou, Bruns and Tiedje., 1996","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info:
Protocol successful at detecting fish sedDNA from stream sediment collected during a fish migration

Protocol unsuccessful at detecting fish sedDNA from Maine lakes
